Hello!

{{meal.name}}

import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Meal} from "./model/meal"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; import {MainPanelService} from "./service/main-panel.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { meals!: Meal[]; checkoutForm = this.formBuilder.group({ name: '', price: '' }); constructor(private mainPanelService: MainPanelService, private router: Router, private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { } onSubmit(): void { this.addMeal({ "name": this.checkoutForm.value.name, "price": Number(this.checkoutForm.value.price) }); this.checkoutForm.reset(); } ngOnInit() { this.getMeals(); } getMeals() { this.mainPanelService.getMeals().subscribe(data => { this.meals = data; }) } addMeal(meal: Partial) { this.mainPanelService.addMeal(meal).subscribe(data => { if (data) { this.getMeals(); } }); } removeMeal(id: number | undefined | null) { if (id) { this.mainPanelService.removeMeal(id).subscribe(data => { if (data) { this.getMeals(); } }); } } }
